meanings.definition: Lacking sufficient sexual activity or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: The undersexed couple sought ways to improve their intimacy.
meanings.sent2: She felt undersexed and wanted to explore her desires.
meanings.sent3: The undersexed cat seemed uninterested in the flirtatious advances of the other felines.
meanings.sent4: The undersexed garden was devoid of the vibrant blooms that usually adorned it.
meanings.sent5: The undersexed novel failed to captivate readers with its lackluster romantic scenes.

meanings.definition: Not having enough sexual desire or interest.
meanings.sent1: He appeared undersexed, showing little interest in romantic gestures.
meanings.sent2: The undersexed teenager found it hard to relate to his peers' discussions about attraction.
meanings.sent3: The undersexed plant refused to bloom despite the perfect growing conditions.
meanings.sent4: Her undersexed imagination struggled to conjure up steamy scenarios.
meanings.sent5: The undersexed party lacked the usual flirtatious energy that filled the room.
